nodes.text: An individual was a criminal living in the galaxy. At one time, over the gas giant Bespin, the criminal ruined the day for the people at a fancy resort club that was in operation over Bespin. After the events at the club, the criminal left in the last available speeder at the club.
Shortly after the criminal left in the speeder, a group of individuals flew in pursuit on some retired air rodeo thrantas located at the club.

The criminal first appeared as part of an adventure idea in "Rodeo Thranta", an article written by Jeff Quick as part of the Creature Feature series of articles for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game that was published on Wizards of the Coast's website. The article was released on December 12, 2002, with the adventure ideas and characters being usable by gamemasters at any time after thrantas were first used in air rodeos, which happened before the destruction of the thrantas' home planet, Alderaan.
